Name: Landmarks, East Tremont Cluster NCP, Bronx (G 240046 XAX)
Title: Application number G 240046 XAX (East Tremont Cluster NCP) submitted by the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development pursuant to Article XI of the Private Housing Finance Law for approval of an Urban Development Action Area Project (UDAAP), and an exemption from real property taxes for property located at 706 Fairmount Place (Block 2950, Lot 18), 907 East 175th Street (Block 2958, Lot 120), and 1900 Marmion Avenue (Block 2960, Lot 21), Borough of the Bronx, Community District 6, Council District 15.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
